entry.title: Transformers learn factored representations
entry.content:
Authors: A Shai, L Amdahl-Culleton, CL Christensen... - arXiv preprint arXiv ..., 2026

Abstract: Transformers pretrained via next token prediction learn to factor their world into parts, representing these factors in orthogonal subspaces of the residual stream. We formalize two representational hypotheses:(1) a representation in the product space ...
